text: @realDonaldTrump @AlexAzar If there’s anything we’ve learned over the excruciating 4 years of Donald Trump’s Presidency is that whenever he says someone is doing a great job, it means they’re going to be fired next week! Azar will be the next victim, in Trump’s Coronavirus scapegoating scheme!
